mapper.insert: insert into reservation (res_num, userid, username, hotel_id, category, hotel_name, room, people, status, request, inq_date, check_in, check_out) values (#{res_num}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{hotel_id}, #{category}, #{hotel_name}, #{room}, #{people}, #{status}, #{request1}, sysdate, #{check_in}, #{check_out})

insert into pay (pay_num, res_num, hotel_id, userid, username, method, price, date_num, people) values (#{pay_num}, #{res_num}, #{hotel_id1}, #{userid1}, #{username1}, #{method}, #{price}, #{date_num}, #{people1})
mapper.select: select url from hotel_picture where hotel_id=#{hotel_id} and type=#{type}

SELECT hotel.hotel_name, hotel.hotel_id, hotel.category, hotel_info.standard, hotel_info.sweet, hotel_info.deluxe, hotel_info.check_in, hotel_info.check_out FROM hotel INNER JOIN hotel_info ON hotel.hotel_id = hotel_info.hotel_id WHERE hotel_info.hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
